thread.section_title: New problems to Bromley Council on FixMyStreet
thread.title: Graffiti on litter bin in Princes Way, Coney Hall, 7th May
thread.title_full: Graffiti on litter bin in Princes Way, Coney Hall, 7th May

title: Graffiti on litter bin in Princes Way, Coney Hall, 7th May
text:
Reported via desktop in the Graffiti category anonymously at 23:58, Wednesday using FixMyStreet Pro
Sent to Bromley Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 7537472.
The graffiti on the litter bin next to bus shelter 0106 1166 in Princes Way, Coney Hall, has been poorly painted out and is still visible. Please would you remove it completely so that it is no longer visible.
Your information will only be used in accordance with our privacy policy
Or sign in with password to prefill this information.
No account? Fill in your details manually.
Forgotten your password? Fill in your details manually.
Forgotten your password? Confirm by email instead, providing a new password at that point. When you confirm, your password will be updated.
Providing a password is optional, but doing so will allow you to more easily report problems, leave updates and manage your reports. Your password should include 8 or more characters.
Share this report on Twitter or Facebook
Receive email when updates are left on this problem.
Thank you for your report, this is now being investigated. Information on our services and the timeframes we aim to respond in can be found: http://www.bromley.gov.uk/ fixservices
Posted by Bromley Council at 23:58, Wednesday
